location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 18 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports the arrival of Messrs Robinson and Crawford from Bombay en route to Europe via Bussora [Basra] and relays information received from India including news that contradicts the report regarding the English capture of sixteen French ships as reported in item IOR/R/15/1/3, p 96 1.
